EmailTemplate.name: 2019.10.24 - BS - Monthly Offer #5 - B.BS - Monthly Offer #5 - B
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Big $30 Is Going, Going, Go…
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
To thank you for being a valued customer and to support your business success, here’s $30 OFF** your next purchase of $100 or more. Valid until Oct 26, 2019 Use code 1910SALE
Free Shipping In Stock Clearance Deal Centre Customer Service <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/contact-us.aspx]]> Terms & Conditions <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/terms-and-conditions.aspx]]> Privacy Policy <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/privacy-policy.aspx]]> View in Web Browser <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Grand & Toy | 200 Aviva Park Drive, Vaughan, ON L4L9C7 | 1 866 391‑8111
*Free Shipping applies to orders of $50 or more. Minimum purchase required before taxes and after discounts. Orders outside our local delivery area, oversized and special order items do not qualify. Non-qualifying orders incur a shipping charge based on order size, weight and delivery location (minimum charge of $9.95). Other restrictions apply. See grandandtoy.com/terms <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/terms-and-conditions]]> or call 1 866 391‑8111 for details. © 2019 Grand & Toy Limited
